critique: The document is an executive order issued by President Trump regarding sanctions against the Venezuelan government. It blocks property and interests in property of the Venezuelan government and certain individuals, suspends entry of certain aliens into the United States, and prohibits transactions that evade or avoid the prohibitions set forth in the order. The order cites the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA), the National Emergencies Act, section 212(f) of the Immigration and Nationality Act of 1952, and section 301 of title 3, United States Code as its legal basis.
